Angry goblins are monsters that appear during A Soul's Bane, or afterwards, in Tolna's rift.

During the quest, they can only be killed with the anger battleaxe. After the quest, they can be fought with any weapon and will count towards a goblins Slayer assignment.

Contents

  • 1 Locations
  • 2 Graphical updates
  • 3 Update history
  • 4 Trivia

Locations[edit | edit source]

Location Levels Members Requirements Spawns Map
Tolna's rift35, 45None2Maplink

Graphical updates[edit | edit source]

  • Angry goblin after 3 April 2006 (update)

  • Angry goblin after 24 April 2007 (update)

  • Angry goblin after 1 July 2008 (update)

  • Angry goblin after 17 October 2012 (update)

Update history[edit | edit source]

This information has been compiled as part of the update history project. Some updates may not be included – see here for how to help out!
  • update 17 October 2012 (Update):
    • Received a graphical update along side goblin raids.
  • update 24 April 2007 (Update):
    • Received a graphical update along side Another Slice of H.A.M.
  • update 3 April 2006 (Update):
    • Added to game.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Although they were graphically reworked along with other monster goblins following the advent of RuneScape 3, they still use older goblin sound effects when attacked.
